table.name: Document_Specification
table.description: Types of documents that the application can manage.

table.name: Document_Event_Type
table.description: Variety of events that can take place while managing documents.

table.name: Document_Source_Type
table.description: Variety of sources that can send us documents to be managed.

table.name: Document_Association_Type
table.description: Variety of assocations that a document can have to another document.
table.enum: Requires review by Person in Organization

table.name: Document_Association_Status
table.description: Variety of associations that a document can have to another document.

table.name: Document
table.description: All documents that we can manage

column.name: doc_id_alias
column.descr: Document ID assigned from the source (alias, if any)

column.name: doc_mime_type
column.descr: The MIME type, if any for this document

column.name: doc_spec_subtype
column.descr: Any subtype/specification of the document (depends upon doc_spec_type -- e.g. it's the message type for a HL7 message)

column.name: doc_source_id
column.descr: The id associated with the source type

column.name: doc_source_subtype
column.descr: Any subtype/specification of the document (depends upon doc_source_type)

column.name: doc_source_system
column.descr: If the document is a message, this is the application that sent the message

column.name: doc_content_uri
column.descr: If the document is addressable by a URI, this is the URI

column.name: doc_content_small
column.descr: They actual content of the document (depends on spec as to whether this or _large is used)

column.name: doc_content_large
column.descr: They actual content of the document

column.name: assn_status
column.descr: Whether or not association is currently active

column.name: assn_sequence
column.descr: If there is more than one association, this is the sequence

column.name: person_id
column.descr: Person for whom document is associated

column.name: org_internal_id
column.descr: Org for whom document is associated

column.name: person_id
column.descr: Person for whom attributed is stored

column.name: org_internal_id
column.descr: Org for whom attributed is stored

column.name: person_id
column.descr: Person for whom keyword is stored

column.name: org_internal_id
column.descr: Org for whom keyword is stored

column.name: parent_obs_id
column.descr: The parent observation (if related to another observation)

column.name: obs_status
column.descr: Whether or not observation is currently active

column.name: obs_sequence
column.descr: If there is more than one observation per document, this is the sequence

column.name: observee_name
column.descr: The person being observed (what was in the HL7 message)

column.name: observer_id
column.descr: The care provider requesting the observation (Physia ID)

column.name: observer_name
column.descr: The care provider requesting the observation (what was in the HL7 message)

column.name: observer_org_id
column.descr: The care provider requesting the observation (organization)

column.name: req_control_num
column.descr: The requester's control number of the observation

column.name: prod_control_num
column.descr: The producer's control number of the observation

column.name: battery_coding
column.descr: The name of the coding system

column.name: alt_battery_coding
column.descr: The alternate name of the coding system

column.name: obs_order_status
column.descr: The order status (X=canceled, P=partial, or F=final)

column.name: result_sequence
column.descr: If there is more than one result per observation, this is the sequence

column.name: result_value_text
column.descr: The observation result value (in text or paragraphs)

column.name: result_value_num
column.descr: The observation result value as a single number

column.name: result_units_id
column.descr: The observation result units of measure (ID)

column.name: result_units_text
column.descr: The observation result units of measure (name)

column.name: result_units_coding
column.descr: The name of the coding system

column.name: alt_units_coding
column.descr: The alternate name of the coding system

column.name: result_normal_range
column.descr: The normal range of the results

column.name: result_order_status
column.descr: The order status (C=corrected, F=final, or P=preliminary, X=deleted)

column.name: event_status
column.descr: Any status message for this event

column.name: obs_id
column.descr: Unique Observation ID (if event was about an observation)

column.name: obs_result_id
column.descr: Unique Observation result ID (if event was about observation result)
